numlitem.para: Left and right CDU EICAS control functions are verified to be operative, and
Individual fuel quantity indications required for dispatch are operative.
Access EICAS control on the affected pilot’s display via the associated CDU.

placard.para: Placard near or on inoperative EFIS control panel (pilots’ glareshield): "INOP – USE CDU". Install Placard near or on EICAS display select panel (pilots’ glareshield): "INOP – USE CDU". Enter items in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Verify EICAS control function is operative from the left and right Control Display Units (CDUs):
Open both P7 panel EFIS CONT L and EFIS CONT R circuit breakers.
Press MENU key on left and right CDUs and verify SELECT> prompt is displayed below EICAS CP annunciation on both CDUs.
Deactivate one of the EFIS control panels and use the associated CDU for EFIS control panel and EICAS display select panel functions:
Collar one of the P7 panel EIFS CONT L or EFIS CONT R circuit breakers opened above and close the other.

note.para: It is preferable to collar the EFIS CONT R circuit breaker.

numlitem.para: Select EICAS CP function and EFIS CP function using the CDU associated with the deactivated EFIS control panel.
